dict.acceptation: 暖气装置[设备]；加热，采暖；
（使）热( heat的现在分词)；使激动；激发；使兴奋；

sent.orig: Electric heating, oil heating, steam heating, outer coil heating, stainless steel reactor.
sent.trans: 电加热、油加热、蒸汽加热、外盘管式加热不锈钢反应锅。

sent.orig: Heating the form of electric heating and steam heating two.
sent.trans: 加热形式分电加热和蒸汽加热两种。

sent.orig: The user can set the heating current, heating time and heating temperature according to the products.
sent.trans: 用户可根据产品自行设定加热电流，加热时间及加热温度。

sent.orig: Casting-aluminum heating device takes Tubular electric heating component as heating material.
sent.trans: 铸铝加热器以管状电热元件为发热体。

sent.orig: This machine adopts heat conducting oil heating, electric heating and coal heating.
sent.trans: 本机采用导热油加热、电加热及燃煤加热三种方式。
